00022 PHM::PHM(int M,int N) : Matrix(M*M) {
00023    
00024    this->N = N;
00025    this->M = M;
00026    this->n = M*M;
00027 
00028    if(counter == 0){
00029 
00030       //allocatie van s2ph
00031       s2ph = new int * [M];
00032       s2ph[0] = new int [M*M];
00033 
00034       for(int i = 1;i < M;++i)
00035          s2ph[i] = s2ph[i - 1] + M;
00036 
00037       //allocatie van ph2s
00038       ph2s = new int * [n];
00039 
00040       for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
00041          ph2s[i] = new int [2];
00042 
00043       //initialisatie van de twee arrays
00044       int teller = 0;
00045 
00046       for(int a = 0;a < M;++a)
00047          for(int b = 0;b < M;++b){
00048 
00049             s2ph[a][b] = teller;
00050 
00051             ph2s[teller][0] = a;
00052             ph2s[teller][1] = b;
00053 
00054             ++teller;
00055 
00056          }
00057 
00058    }
00059 
00060    ++counter;
00061 
00062 }

00114 PHM::~PHM(){
00115 
00116    if(counter == 1){
00117 
00118       delete [] s2ph[0];

00140 double PHM::operator()(int a,int b,int c,int d) const{
00141 
00142    int i = s2ph[a][b];
00143    int j = s2ph[c][d];
00144 
00145    return (*this)(i,j);

00149 ostream &operator<<(ostream &output,const PHM &phm_p){
00150

00152       for(int j = 0;j < phm_p.n;++j){

00195 void PHM::G(TPM &tpm){
00196 
00197    SPM spm(tpm);
00198 
00199    int a,b,c,d;
00200 
00201    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i){
00202 
00203       a = ph2s[i][0];
00204       b = ph2s[i][1];
00205 
00206       for(int j = i;j < n;++j){
00207 
00208          c = ph2s[j][0];
00209          d = ph2s[j][1];
00210 
00211          (*this)(i,j) = -tpm(a,d,c,b);
00212 
00213          if(b == d)
00214             (*this)(i,j) += spm(a,c);
00215 
00216       }
00217    }
00218 
00219    this->symmetrize();
00220 
00221 }
